title: My "perfect" family
creator_credit: Ebonie Sadler-Small, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: While Ebonie Sadler-Small grew up with her grandmother, she attributes her entire family to the inspiring youth leader she is today. Ebonie feels that in not having a conventional family, she has gained an non-judgemental, adventurous and optimistic outlook on life. With her family and friends, Ebonie has been encouraged and supported and she feels this has given her the strength and confidence to achieve in life.
